website_summaries.verdict: A practical eyeshadow palette with 12 warm-toned neutral shades that almost any consumer can wear day or night.
pros: These shades are made with tarte's Amazonian clay, which makes them easy to apply, smooth, and creamy
Twelve buildable shades that are flattering on all skin tones
Includes matte and micro-shimmer finishes that are almost effortless to blend
cons: Some of the lighter shades aren't very pigmented

customer_reviews.title: Go to pallet - LUV !
customer_reviews.text: love this pallet will always have one of these on hand with great blend-able colors and rich pigments.
customer_reviews.author: PS_Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect neutral palette for day or night
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this palette! It has the perfect range of pink-toned and brown-toned neutrals for low-key daytime looks or for more dramatic looks. The eyeshadow smells amazing, also, every time I open the palette I'm taken by surprise by that. These shadows have a little more "shed" than some I've used, tap your brush thoroughly to avoid getting fallout on your face. Also, as so many reviewers have said, please package these better! Mine came intact but bumping around loose in a big box with other items so I got lucky.
customer_reviews.author: The Plunge

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Colors
customer_reviews.text: I'm always hesitant to purchased make-up online, but this was perfect. Colors are gorgeous. Tarte always makes great products!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived safely and securely. I had 2 pallets and one was okay, the other was busted. This was the one they wrapped up.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: My "to go" Palette!
customer_reviews.text: I can do many different looks with this palette. Its original! I was afraid of a chinese knock off. But colors stay long, blend very good. I licke the packaging also, nice size, nice colors, and also versatil! I love the big mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Carocaro39

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t know makeup could smell so good
customer_reviews.text: Smells AMAZING and absolutely beautiful color palette! There is a bit more fallout than my other tarte palette (make magic happen). Otherwise totally love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pictoure isn't true to colors, more brownish than pink tones
customer_reviews.author: Ivelisse

customer_reviews.title: Great shadows but some fallout
customer_reviews.text: I love the range of eyeshadows in this set and the formula allows the colors to blend together smoothly. The pigments seem to last me through-out the day as long as I apply an eyeshadow primer underneath. My only con is that there is a lot of a fallout on the pan and I end up tapping off a lot of excess before applying it to my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert & Celeste Mason

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It smells like chocolate! Gorgeous colors. A bit of fallout. Very bendable. Nice compact.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Not much color
customer_reviews.text: I use mostly the lighter shades and they’re practically invisible on my skin. The white is completely transparent and leaves no color at all. I can’t believe how overpriced this is
customer_reviews.author: A. H. Clay

customer_reviews.title: Not very pigmented
customer_reviews.text: Eh, I don’t feel like it’s very pigmented. I was so excited to try it out, love the colors in the palette.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few years love this eye shadow!
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This color palette was sold out at my local store, was glad to find it online for a lower price. It’s a great palette for people who like more natural tones.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shadows. They stay put on my eyelids. Other brands come off and land on my cheeks upon application. These do not. Great colors. Great smell!
customer_reviews.author: B. Simek

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful palette of colors
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful palette of colors. Very natural looking for Day wear. Smells good too!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ginsburg

customer_reviews.title: I very like it!
customer_reviews.text: The seller is very good! Well packed! Fast delivery! The product is perfect! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: HUANG HE

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice palette but it came with a broken eyeshadow on the left side wasn’t packaged secured enough disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chabelli

customer_reviews.title: My wife my wife is very excited to receive this product
customer_reviews.text: My wife my wife is very excited to receive this product
customer_reviews.author: Bryan E Castle

customer_reviews.title: Make sure they add extra packing mine was broken
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color but my order came broken but I returned it and got a new one in tact love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love this palette and it smells amazing! It stays on all day and the colors are rich. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for many years. Good value, nice colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ticklefoot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Original packaging, was able to get it here when they were out at my local Ulta. Arrived perfect! Love the product, colors are great autumn hues!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: All the eye shadow you need!
customer_reviews.text: Even comes with a couple suggestions for different looks. Goes are great and love the colors. This is all I take with me on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Mutert Fam

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED SHATTERED WITH PIGMENT EVERYWHERE.
customer_reviews.text: Right when I opened the package, there was eyeshadow pigment all over my hands. Upon opening the actual eyeshadow palette, I discovered that one of the eyeshadow shades had completely shattered and ruined the rest of the palette. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I use with an eyeshadow primer ...otherwise I notice my skin’s natural oils start washing out the eye shadow by the end of the day!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnae

customer_reviews.title: Not properly packaged
customer_reviews.text: The bottom right color was smashed to bits. Would buy one more time. The product itself is great
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Whaley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors! Love this palette! I have very fair skin and the colors compliment well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Yost

customer_reviews.title: Broken Eyeshadows
customer_reviews.text: This product cane broken! 2 eyeshadows were broken when I received it. I read the reviews however I would have thought by now they would have fixed the problem. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: OliviaP

customer_reviews.title: Nice neutral colors
customer_reviews.text: Great pallet! I bought this as a gift for my mom but I borrow it sometimes because I love the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell of these eye shadows and the colors ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of these eye shadows and the colors are perfect but they crease really bad by the afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: c.hein

customer_reviews.title: Product was damaged upon opening.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened it several of the eye shadow squares were broken and in several pieces and powder spread over the rest of the palette.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t package with other items in an envelope!
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived with broken eyeshadow:( it was just 3 colors total but I still feel a bit robbed.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Highly unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: The product came damaged with two of the eyeshadows broken and crushed in the palette.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken pallet
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors but I was sad when I opened it and it came broken.
customer_reviews.author: Berenice Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: All the different hues in this collection are perfect for my make up. This will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pigment sea natural color range! Go Tarte! I truly appreciate what you DON'T put in your products.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon McGhee

customer_reviews.title: Love the brand tarte
customer_reviews.text: In love with this pallet has the best neutral colors. Love the shimmer it lasts all work day which is awesome. I use this pallet every day tarte has great eyeshadow.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Doucette

customer_reviews.title: Great Looks
customer_reviews.text: I love the many looks I can achieve with this pallet and there isn’t a lot of fallout when applying. There isn’t any dislike.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken shadows
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with broken eyeshadows and with powder dust residue on inner packaging. Delivery box was not damaged from outside.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Love this Palette!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty colors, seems to be lasting for a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Connor Waitt

customer_reviews.title: Delivered sooner than anticipated and great price point from this seller
customer_reviews.text: Lovely palette of warm neutral colors. Delivered sooner than anticipated and great price point from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! These colors are beautiful and the pallet is high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsee McGregor-Stromberg

customer_reviews.title: A staple
customer_reviews.text: My partner said it’s a great palette for every day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Broken pallet
customer_reviews.text: I received a broken pallet. I recommend trying to find it in a store
customer_reviews.author: Ally C.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty but certainly not the best price option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Tarte Tartelette In Bloom Clay Eyeshadow Palette
product_meta.description: TARTE Tartelette 2 In Bloom Amazonian Clay Palette by Tarte
